pkgmetadata.longdescription: # languagecodes![package](https://github.com/alephdata/languagecodes/workflows/package/badge.svg)This library helps to normalise the ISO 639 codes used to describe languages fromtwo-letter codes to three letters, and vice versa.```pythonimport languagecodesassert 'eng' == languagecodes.iso_639_alpha3('en')assert 'eng' == languagecodes.iso_639_alpha3('ENG ')assert 'en' == languagecodes.iso_639_alpha2('ENG ')```You can install the library from the Python package index:```bashpip install languagecodes```Uses data from: https://iso639-3.sil.org/See also: https://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php
